      • IfxGssCsm

        public IfxGssCsm(IfxCsmDescriptor csmdescr)
          throws IfxCsmException
        initialises csm. constructor should set load_state from descriptor to CSS_CSM_LOADING_ERROR in case anything goes wrong.. such as initString for csm is not in right format etc.

      • ifxCsmCreateContext

        public int ifxCsmCreateContext(IfxCsm.Credentials credentials,
                      IfxCsmReadBuffer inHndShk,
                      IfxCsmBuffer outHndShk,
                      java.lang.String contextInitString,
                      IfxCsm.Status status)
                        throws IfxCsmException
        Create a connection. There are several states during the connection phase: ENC_CSM_STATE_INITIAL Just initialized the context ENC_CSM_STATE_INITSTRING I have created the init string ENC_CSM_STATE_INITSTRINGPENDING I have created the init string, but not yet sent it. I probably received the peer string first and need to fully accept it. END_CSM_STATE_INITSTRING_SEND Send the init string END_CSM_STATE_READY Ready to enter data transfer
        Specified by:
        ifxCsmCreateContext in interface IfxCsm
        Parameters:
        cred -
        inHandshake -
        outHandShake -
        contextInitString -
        status -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IfxCsmException

      • ifxCsmProcessOutMessage

        public int ifxCsmProcessOutMessage(IfxCsmReadBuffer inBuffer,
                          IfxCsmBuffer outBuffer,
                          IfxCsm.Status status)
                            throws IfxCsmException
        inBuffer contains bytes to be encrypted this method does not change inBuffer in any manner. Also encrypted bytes are appended to existing contents of outBuffer initial contents of outBuffer are NOT lost Check to make sure that status.setCsmCode is CSM_DONE
        Specified by:
        ifxCsmProcessOutMessage in interface IfxCsm
        Parameters:
        inBuffer -
        outBuffer -
        status -
        Returns:
        FUNCSUCC if no errors FUNCFAIL if some error occured
        Throws:
        IfxCsmException

      • ifxCsmProcessInMessage

        public int ifxCsmProcessInMessage(IfxCsmReadBuffer inBuffer,
                         IfxCsmBuffer outBuffer,
                         IfxCsm.Status status)
                           throws IfxCsmException
        This method does not modify contents of inBuffer in any manner Also does not reference to inBuffer's internal buffer with anybody Also decrypted bytes are appended to existing contents of outBuffer , if any initial contents of outBuffer are NOT lost Also
        Specified by:
        ifxCsmProcessInMessage in interface IfxCsm
        Parameters:
        inBuffer -
        outBuffer -
        status -
        Returns:
        if inBuffer is null or there is nothing in it , CsmCode is set to CSM_MORE_INPUT_NEEDED , with return value of FUNCSUCC if sum of bytes in inBuffer and the number of bytes in internal saved buffer is smaller than size of Header (IfxGssMsgHdr.GSS_CSM_HDRSIZE) , CsmCode is set to CSM_MORE_INPUT_NEEDED . if sum of bytes in inBuffer and the number of bytes in internal saved buffer is smaller than sum of IfxGssMsgHdr.GSS_CSM_HDRSIZE and the size of message itself , CsmCode is set to CSM_MORE_INPUT_NEEDED . Otherwise CsmCode is set to CSM_DONE
        Throws:
        IfxCsmException
